OOC: SOULSTICE winks to Alloran and gives him a thumbs up.

BIC: A stasis pod falls in front of the Maximal base. Airbomber gets
repaired and notices it. He sees Infectra. He apologizes and kisses her,
then runs outside. He makes sure there aren't any of those sneaky Deemos'
around and knocks on the pod. The pod scans a wolf. Airbomber watches as it
opens. The bot transforms to robot mode and stares Airbomber in the eyes...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 30, 2000 3:41 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


>
> ::All was quiet at the Neocon base.  Galvatron, fully healed, was plotting
> his next attack.  Then all of a sudden, a pod crashed near them.  It
opened
> up and a massive(Optimal Optimus sized) robot stepped out.  One of the
> greatest Decepticon leaders ever, DEATHSAURUS!::
> Galvatron: Deathsaurus? but you were destroyed by Star Saber!
> Deathsaurus: Ah yes, Galvatron! My impudent successor. Do you call this
hunk
> of junk a base?
> Galvatron: Why yes i do!  I lead a faction known as the Neocons.  Would
you
> like to join?
> Deathsaurus: I've got a better idea.  We fight for leadership!
> ::Galvatron needed no more hints.  He took a sword out of subspace, and
> Deathsaurus followed suit. They locked swords.  After a long time, the
battle
> seemed to be nearly over::
> Deathsarus: You fought well(pant) Galvatron.
> Galvatron: As did you.
> Deathsaurus: Good bye, Galvatron........ Tigerbreast, Eaglebreast, attack!
> ::Tigerbreast and Eaglebreast deploy and rip Galvatron apart.  Megastorm
> sees::
> Megastorm: NOOOO! I was supposed to kill him!
> Deathsaurus: And i'm supposed to kill you!
> ::He runs at him and slices his head off.  Mech fluid everywhere, the
battle
> had ended.  The Aerocons, who had been watching in horror, found that
> Deathsaurus was there new leader!
> Deathsaurus:  From now on the Neocons will be led to glory and honor!
under
> me!
>
> OOC: please put Galvatron and Megastorm on the deceased list, killed by
> Deathsaurus,.
>
>
>
